Name: Cave Scanner
Description: Cave Scanner General Category Tools Tech Tier Tier 3 Description A scanner that can locate caves within the surrounding area. Right click to toggle audible beeping. Flavor Text Making life easier, one piece of technology at a time. Statistics Weight 1.0 Kg Misc Crafted At Machining Bench
CraftedIn: {"@context":"http://schema.org","@type":"Article","url":"https://icarus.fandom.com/wiki/Cave_Scanner","name":"Cave Scanner","headline":"Cave Scanner","mainEntity":{"@type":"Thing","url":"https://icarus.fandom.com/wiki/Cave_Scanner","name":"Cave Scanner","image":"https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/icarus/images/6/66/ITEM_Cave_Scanner.png/revision/latest?cb=20220408200700"},"about":{"@type":"Thing","url":"https://icarus.fandom.com/wiki/Cave_Scanner","name":"Cave Scanner","image":"https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/icarus/images/6/66/ITEM_Cave_Scanner.png/revision/latest?cb=20220408200700"},"author":{"@type":"Organization","url":"https://icarus.fandom.com/wiki/Cave_Scanner?action=credits","name":"Contributors to Icarus Wiki"},"publisher":{"@type":"Organization","name":"Fandom, Inc.","logo":{"@type":"ImageObject","url":"https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/750feb85-de88-4a4f-b294-8b48142ac182/thumbnail-down/width/1280/height/720"}},"abstract":"Locates caves with audible beeping. While the cave scanner is equipped and in hand the scanner's lights will blink and it will beep so long as a cave is somewhat nearby. The frequency of blinking/beeping increases as the Prospector approaches a cave. Furthermore, the scanner will beep more rapidly if the Prospector is looking in the direction of a cave. The Cave Scanner is crafted at the Machining Bench with the following resources:","image":"https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/icarus/images/6/66/ITEM_Cave_Scanner.png/revision/latest?cb=20220408200700","thumbnailUrl":"https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/icarus/images/6/66/ITEM_Cave_Scanner.png/revision/latest?cb=20220408200700"}
